contents.content: _{You may need to pick a subclass (bloodline, doctrine etc).}
_{Two +1 from your background, one a free choice.}
_{Your proficiency bonuses at level 1 are: 0, 3, 5, 7 and 9. They increase as you level up.}
_{Gain proficiencies from your background and class.}
_{Become trained in a number of skills based on your class.}
_{If two sources give you training in the same skill, they don't add up. You may be able to spend the training elsewhere.}

_{You are a master of artistry, a scholar of hidden secrets, and a captivating persuader. Using powerful performances, you influence minds and elevate souls to new levels of heroics. You might use your powers to become a charismatic leader, or perhaps you might instead be a counselor, manipulator, scholar, scoundrel, or virtuoso. While your versatility leads some to consider you a beguiling neerdo- well and a jack-of-all-trades, its dangerous to dismiss you as a master of none.}
_{You use magical performances to alter the odds in favor of your allies. You confidently alternate between attacks, healing, and helpful spells as needed.}
contents.title: _{During combat encounters...}

contents.content: _{You persuade, prevaricate, and threaten with ease.}
contents.title: _{During social encounters...}

contents.content: _{Youre a font of knowledge, folktales, legends, and lore that provide a deeper context and helpful reconnaissance for the groups adventure. Your spells and performances inspire your allies to greater discovery and success.}
contents.title: _{While exploring...}

contents.content: _{Attack with a weapon or unarmed. On a critical success, deal double damage and possibly other effects.}
contents.title: _{Strike}

contents.content: _{Drop an item or take one hand off a weapon. Does not trigger reactions.}
contents.title: _{Release}

contents.content: _{Postpone your turn until later; jump in as a free action. You cannot use reactions until then.}
contents.title: _{Delay}

contents.content: _{Attempt a check to assist an ally with a check - at the risk of hindering them on a failure.}
contents.title: _{Aid}

contents.content: _{Prepare an action to take outside your turn on a certain trigger.}
contents.title: _{Ready}

contents.content: _{Restore a focus point. You can only do this once between fights.}
contents.title: _{Refocus}

contents.content: _{Keep a spell effect going for another round.}
contents.title: _{Sustain}

contents.content: _{Take 10 minutes to identify a magical item, location or effect.}
contents.title: _{Identify Magic (Occultism/other)}

contents.content: _{GM sets the hidden DC of the check.}
contents.title: _{Earn Income (Performance)}

contents.content: _{Cannot use this during rage. Includes all spells with a verbal component.}
_{Affects how you roll the dice. Can only use one fortune effect at once; fortune and misfortune effects cancel out.}
_{Physical action that may trigger reactions. Includes all spells with a material or somatic component.}
_{Use directly before casting a spell to alter its effect.}
_{On a critical hit, add another damage die.}
_{Can use this weapon to disarm. Add the weapon's attack bonus to an Athletics check to disarm.}
_{Can add your Dex rather than Str to attack rolls. Does not affect damage.}
_{Knock an enemy out rather than killing them. -2 to make a lethal attack.}
_{Can be used to attack enemies 10ft away.}
_{Can use this weapon to trip, with its reach. Add the weapon's attack bonus to an Athletics check to trip.}
_{GM may award more during play, up to 3.}
_{Must use the second result. Cannot reroll again, or after any Fortune effect.}
contents.title: _{Reroll a check}

contents.content: _{Reduce dying to 0 and stabilise with 0hp. Don't become wounded.}
contents.title: _{Avoid death}

contents.content: _{Can spend a Hero Point on behalf of your familiar or animal companion.}
_{May use 10 + proficiency bonus (inc level, but no other bonuses) rather than roll.}
contents.title: _{Assurance}

contents.content: _{Take 10 minutes to identify a magical item, location or effect.}
contents.title: _{Identify Magic (Occultism/other)}

contents.content: _{GM sets the hidden DC of the check.}
contents.title: _{Earn Income (Performance)}

contents.content: _{Also treat wounds, repair an item, identify an item, or change armour}
_{Deduct hardness, then apply remaining damage to both shield and yourself.}
contents.title: _{Shield Block}

contents.content: _{When you roll a success, it becomes critical success}
contents.title: _{Upgrade success}

contents.content: _{When you roll a critical failure, it becomes failure}
contents.title: _{Reduce failure}

contents.content: _{Cast spells you know using spell slots.}
contents.title: _{Spells}

contents.content: _{Spells must be learned at a higher rank to heighten}
_{Signature spells can be heightened without learning separately.}
_{Increase your level by 1 and subtract 1000 XP.}
_{Add class features from your class advancement table.}
_{At levels 5, 10, 15 and 20, boost 4 different attribute scores. Increase by 1 if the score is already 18 or above, or 2 if not.}
_{At select levels, increase proficiency in one skill.}
_{Select feats as indicated on your class advancement table.}
_{Add spells and spell slots if your class grants spellcasting.}
_{Increase all of your proficiency bonuses, and add proficiencies from skill increases or other class features.}
_{Increase any statistics that changed as a result of ability boosts or other abilities.}
_{Adjust bonuses from feats and other abilities that are based on your level.}
_{With your GM's permission, you can retrain certain features.}
_{Replace one feat with another of the same type and appropriate level.}
_{Swap out one of your skill proficiency ranks, including initial skills.}
_{The new proficiency rank cannot exceed the rank you traded away.}
_{Change a class choice. GM will tell you how long this takes  always at least a month.}
